credit_line: Gift of Charles Savage Homer, Jr.
title: Bay at Cullercoats, England, with View of Ruins of Tynemouth Priory in the Distance
medium: Charcoal, white chalk on white paper
description: Horizontal view of the bay at Cullercoats with waves breaking on the sand followed by a darker area of rocks, in right foreground, and a jutting point of land, at right background, with suggestions of ruins of Tynemouth Priory outlined against a sky made up of white clouds at right and large dark masses at left.
name: Drawing
